description: An e-commerce web application that allows users to browse, search, and purchase books online with personalized recommendations and secure checkout.

browsing_and_search: Search bar with filters (genre, author, price, rating)
Sorting by popularity, release date, or price
book_detail_page: Book cover, title, author, price, description

design.style: Modern, clean, and responsive design with a focus on readability and easy navigation.
design.color_scheme: Neutral background with accent colors (e.g., navy and gold) for highlights.
design.layout: Grid-based layout for book listings, card-style components, sticky navigation bar, and responsive mobile adaptation.

infrastructure.deployment: Docker containers on AWS or Vercel

content.book_data: Title, author, ISBN, price, description, cover image, category, stock quantity, and rating.
content.user_data: Name, email, address, order history, preferences.
